Plot: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean, an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.
Title: Quartet
Actors: Maggie Smith, Tom Courtenay, Billy Connolly, Pauline Collins
tomatoConsensus: It's sweet, gentle, and predictable to a fault, but Dustin Hoffman's affectionate direction and the talented cast's amiable charm make Quartet too difficult to resist.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
